articles.description: UN calls for urgent focus on HIV/Aids as coronavirus blocks access to drugs and missed targets threaten to derail progress
articles.content:
Global progress on ending the Aids epidemic by 2030 could be blown off course by coronavirus, a senior UN director has warned.

articles.title: Covid-19 mass testing to begin in Coventry next week - Coventry Live

Coronavirus mass testing is to begin in Coventry next week with a pilot scheme amongst around 450 council workers.
